# Livestock Farming Management System - Web Portal

## Project Setup Progress

- [x] Create Next.js project structure
- [x] Install dependencies
- [ ] Configure Firebase
- [ ] Create shared components
- [ ] Build Admin Dashboard
- [ ] Build Buyer Portal
- [ ] Test integration

## Project Type
Next.js 14 with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS

## Architecture
- Admin Dashboard: Full CRUD operations for livestock management
- Buyer Portal: Read-only interface for livestock browsing
- Firebase Firestore: Shared backend with Flutter mobile app

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript strictly
- Follow Next.js 14 App Router conventions
- Maintain consistent component structure
- Write clear, maintainable code suitable for academic review
